received.title: [IMPORTANT]: Update your CV
received.author: peter@capgemini.es
received.message: Please, update your CV asap or you will be fired. Final warning.

received.title: [Capgemini]: New courses in MyLearning
received.author: rrhh@capgemini.com
received.message: Courses in MyLearning platform have been recently updated. Please take a look at them.
